title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: December 29, 2022, 11:25:59 PMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 09:19:13 PM by Kryptowerk
content: If you got any of these, graded, ungraded, not important. Shoot me offers via pm.I'm also down to trade against some oldschool German silver coins (old DM) or other crypto collectibles.Note: If you got not exactly these but similar coins, feel free to send an offer, too.Pics for reference:

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Added more things in my search: any 0.5 - 5 oz Bitcoin-themed silver coinsIf colored that's a nice extra. Ideally looking to buy near spot (plus a some extra), we can talk about it.If- very rare- colored- high gradedcoin then we can also discuss higher premiums.Also down to buy bulks of 2 - 5 coins if in great quality.Shoot me a pm!(BUMP)

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Bump.Quick note: Should be Bitcoin themed or other major cryptos (no total bullshit like XRP or shitcoin crash etc please).

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Possibly not something that you are interested in, but I figured I’d bring this to your attention in the event that colorized coins related to Bitcoin are your thing…https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2286786.0Colorized, capable of storing Bitcoin, .9999 silver… Probably more affordable than you think as well. Good luck with your search.
